title: OSSEC - Syslog
description: -   This dashboard offers comprehensive insights into syslog events and activities conducted on systems, like user operations, the use of sudo/su, Linux Kernel events, or installation and removal of Debian or Yum packages.

definition.content:
### Dashboard Overview
Syslog dashboard offers comprehensive insights into syslog events and activities conducted on systems, like user operations, the use of sudo/su, Linux Kernel events, or installation and removal of Debian or Yum packages.

For more information, see the [OSSEC Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/ossec_security/)

Tips:
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Top 10 Linux Kernel Events by Level
Log Details of New User Added to System
Top 10 Authentication Failed Events By Source IP

search.query: source:ossec-security service:syslog @group_list:(" su" OR su) @group_list:(authentication_success OR authentication_failed) $Level $Source_IP $Group_List $Host_Name
